snippet.title: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom - Prince’s Edition - Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
From a boy… to a King 👑 
Join Evan and his friends on an epic adventure to build your kingdom in Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom - Prince’s Edition - coming to Nintendo Switch on 17 September! 

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu - http://www.ninokuni.jp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ninokunigameeurope

#NiNoKuni #RevenantKingdom #NintendoSwitch
